TopicTitle: The Asteroid Sentinels: A KSP Graphic Novel (Series 8 Episode 10: Finale!)

Articles.Content: The War Room assembles to debate two issues: Saving Walt Kerman, and ideas for the next backup probes. A splinter of the RDF on the other hand...![6EoQOky.png](http://imgur.com/6EoQOky.png)![qkWhT4f.png](http://imgur.com/qkWhT4f.png)![cbNqSDO.png](http://imgur.com/cbNqSDO.png)![sIYmnWi.png](http://imgur.com/sIYmnWi.png)![Qgn7awx.png](http://imgur.com/Qgn7awx.png)![1GhFGcE.png](http://imgur.com/1GhFGcE.png)![rxRVCDh.png](http://imgur.com/rxRVCDh.png)
A sneak peek for the next episode:![8wtbXcX.png](http://i.imgur.com/8wtbXcX.png)

Here is the next episode of The Asteroid Sentinels!

![8BCfJ3s.png](http://imgur.com/8BCfJ3s.png)![5xFB5JB.png](http://imgur.com/5xFB5JB.png)![TxuTUBe.png](http://imgur.com/TxuTUBe.png)![Bw1sQJT.png](http://imgur.com/Bw1sQJT.png)![ZTYtzML.png](http://imgur.com/ZTYtzML.png)

Thanks for reading! I would very much enjoy some thought and discussion about the series.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-01-16T18:07:55Z" title="01/16/2017 06:07  PM" data-short="7 yr">January 16, 2017</time> by SaturnianBlue**

Oh I love the spin on KNN news!  Very, very realistic in how some worship the media, and others despise it. Nicely done!  ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

> 
> 
> 22 minutes ago, Just Jim said:
> 
> 
> Oh I love the spin on KNN news!  Very, very realistic in how some worship the media, and others despise it. Nicely done!  ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")
> 

There are after all, two sides of the same story. The interesting thing about all of this is that a reader of the Real Deal will have a completely different sense of reality than that of a viewer of the KNN, and in the end no one will know what "actually" happened.

> 
> 
> 49 minutes ago, SaturnianBlue said:
> 
> 
> There are after all, two sides of the same story. The interesting thing about all of this is that a reader of the Real Deal will have a completely different sense of reality than that of a viewer of the KNN, and in the end no one will know what "actually" happened.
> 

Actually, I was brought up believing there are three sides... my side, the other guy's side, and the truth... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Just Jim said:
> 
> 
> Actually, I was brought up believing there are three sides... my side, the other guy's side, and the truth... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
> 

Who knows, there might be more!
Finished the general script for the next episode! For one thing, we'll finally get back to the good (really?) kerbals on the Asteroid Destroyer!

Here is the 16th episode of Series 7! 

![t74IR4T.png](http://imgur.com/t74IR4T.png)

![PpCVckY.png](http://imgur.com/PpCVckY.png)

![07W2nqC.png](http://imgur.com/07W2nqC.png)

![gocZYKY.png](http://imgur.com/gocZYKY.png)

![SgluPNf.png](http://imgur.com/SgluPNf.png)

What happens next? Give me your thoughts, and feedback!

Especially during the upcoming episodes, I would greatly appreciate finding potential holes in the plan Bill brought up as well as the RDF's (master) plans. I've also wondered what you think of the characters.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-01-19T02:51:22Z" title="01/19/2017 02:51  AM" data-short="7 yr">January 19, 2017</time> by SaturnianBlue**

I've almost done with the next episode of the comic! 

Sneak Peek

![7JmP2ba.png](http://imgur.com/7JmP2ba.png)

Episode 17 is out! This is essentially a part II of episode 16 and will follow up on what happens next in space and for Gus...![Q877KRO.png](http://imgur.com/Q877KRO.png)![zgujbCM.png](http://imgur.com/zgujbCM.png)![uzXeQHr.png](http://imgur.com/uzXeQHr.png)![IfrmG1Q.png](http://imgur.com/IfrmG1Q.png)Please leave feedback for this series! Constructive criticism is dearly welcome and helps me improve this series (especially when I'm in a situation like now when i don't really know what to do for the next episode).

**Edited <time datetime="2017-01-22T02:58:00Z" title="01/22/2017 02:58  AM" data-short="7 yr">January 22, 2017</time> by SaturnianBlue**

Episode 18 of Series 7 with a bang with a good idea for the RDF's eventual plans, the recruiting of another kerbal into the *Asteroid Destroyer* plot, and testing of the Mark 2 backup!![c9eHjgE.png](http://imgur.com/c9eHjgE.png)![PAnRWbt.png](http://imgur.com/PAnRWbt.png)![9lRY0a1.png](http://imgur.com/9lRY0a1.png)![LxaM71y.png](http://imgur.com/LxaM71y.png)![xrbXpHZ.png](http://imgur.com/xrbXpHZ.png)I've gotten the Kerbal Hacks mod and given my kerbals some interesting tools, given the implied fact that this is in a somewhat more future-ish era. 

I'd love some feedback, especially on character development, what you think of these plans, and of course i would welcome other ones types too!

**Edited <time datetime="2017-01-27T00:24:35Z" title="01/27/2017 12:24  AM" data-short="7 yr">January 27, 2017</time> by SaturnianBlue**

OK, I'm not completely sure I know what's going on (sorry, have only been reading intermittently) but I do love the visuals ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Kuzzter said:
>

> OK, I'm not completely sure I know what's going on (sorry, have only been reading intermittently) but I do love the visuals ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

What parts do you not get, exactly?

The Series Seven finale is here! Seeing as this series has lasted for just this long, it is a good time to close this chapter and start with a new one. It is perhaps a more quiet ending, and I hope you will enjoy!

![hoXMAss.png](http://imgur.com/hoXMAss.png)

![jWvWWIJ.png](http://imgur.com/jWvWWIJ.png)![zCA0gbm.png](http://imgur.com/zCA0gbm.png)![wTDgbiu.png](http://imgur.com/wTDgbiu.png)

Thanks for reading; provide me with all sorts of feedback—it's quite motivating and useful to have! I'm especially interested in what you have to say about the characters.

I've compiled the whole of Series 7 into one album! Hopefully nothing is out of order! If you find something that is, please let me know!

[Here's the link!](http://imgur.com/a/uH7LV)

The next episode of The Asteroid Sentinel;s is going to be an interlude between Series 7 and the (probably) shorter Series 8. Here's a couple of sneak peeks for that very episode.![NXjz0Sk.png](http://imgur.com/NXjz0Sk.png)![1iKXnm5.png](http://imgur.com/1iKXnm5.png)

Here's an interlude to try to bridge the gap in time between Series 7 and Series 8! ![ivCYi7L.png](http://imgur.com/ivCYi7L.png)![hOKnw6s.png](http://imgur.com/hOKnw6s.png)![7Pgp0zy.png](http://imgur.com/7Pgp0zy.png)![tdXhzRC.png](http://imgur.com/tdXhzRC.png)

Thanks for reading, leave a comment telling me what you think of the series!

Anyone want to guess what this might have in hold? 

![uFY7cev.png](http://imgur.com/uFY7cev.png)

Stay tuned for Series Eight's first episode to find out!
![qRYCUGU.png](http://imgur.com/qRYCUGU.png)![jGeVtzy.png](http://imgur.com/jGeVtzy.png)![JPOLLHL.png](http://imgur.com/JPOLLHL.png)![V3tpaat.png](http://imgur.com/V3tpaat.png)

I've drafted the script for the next episode. The next episode for one thing, will include the launch of the new Asteroid Destroyer "Mark 3" design.  The episodes of Series 8 will probably be shorter (I'm finding it a bit hard to put in content for such long episodes..).

Here's a picture of the whole rocket stack fully assembled, ready to launch.![dQ3w15N.png](http://imgur.com/dQ3w15N.png)
